alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 7:25PM CDT until August 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jones, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Luther, Wellston, Arcadia and Forest Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
